description: This command returns a list of all domains that are connected to a specific domain addon
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: Filter by a specific addon ID. You can specify several addon IDs separated by a '/'. If no addon ID is specified all addon IDs of the addon class will be taken
Filter by a specific domain repository
Filter by the status of the domain addon
Set to 1 to generate additional statistics
Index of the first entry to be returned
Max. number of entries to be returned. The system has a default value for performance purposes

The parameter by which the output will be sorted. Must be one of the following: CREATEDDATECREATEDDATE, CREATEDDATEDESC, EXPIRATIONDATE, EXPIRATIONDATEDESC, STATUS, STATUSDESC, DOMAIN, DOMAINDESC, ADDONID, ADDONIDDESC
The minimal date when the addon was added for the respective domain
The maximal date when the addon was added for the respective domain
